statements: INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (1, 'Water Conservation Act', 'This act promotes water conservation efforts in the state.', 'Reduce water usage by 20%', 'Department of Environmental Protection');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (2, 'Water Usage Restrictions', 'These restrictions limit water usage during drought seasons.', 'No outdoor watering between 10 am and 4 pm', 'County Water Board');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (3, 'Water Quality Standards', 'Standards set for maintaining water quality in lakes and rivers.', 'Regular testing for pollutants', 'Department of Health');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (4, 'Greywater Recycling', 'Encourages the use of greywater for non-potable purposes.', 'Install greywater recycling systems', 'City Planning Department');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (5, 'Drought Management Plan', 'Plan to manage water resources during drought conditions.', 'Implement water use restrictions based on severity', 'State Water Resources Board');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (1, 'Regulation 1', 'This regulation focuses on water usage limitations for industrial facilities.', 'Submit annual water usage reports.', 'Environmental Protection Agency');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (2, 'Regulation 2', 'Aimed at promoting water conservation in residential areas through education programs.', 'Attend water conservation workshops.', 'Department of Water Resources');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (3, 'Regulation 3', 'Regulation to monitor and manage water quality in public water bodies.', 'Conduct regular water quality tests.', 'State Water Board');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (4, 'Regulation 4', 'Establishes guidelines for sustainable water usage in agricultural practices.', 'Implement irrigation best practices.', 'Department of Agriculture');

INSERT INTO water_conservation_regulations (regulation_id, regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_requirements, enforcement_agency) VALUES (5, 'Regulation 5', 'Focused on reducing water wastage in commercial buildings through efficient plumbing systems.', 'Install water-saving fixtures.', 'Occupational Safety and Health Administration');
